content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a cause that occurred in antwerp on february 4th 2020 it does not provide specific details about the cost and duration of the procedure the text explains the steps taken and the parties involved without mentioning any specific names it discusses the application for a preferential award the appointment of an expert to assess the case and the principles of law used in the decision it also mentions the preferential allocation of assets and the possibility of bringing an application for adjudication during liquidation proceedings the text addresses the compensation claim rights of a spouse and the valuation of a disputed business it also mentions the interest entitlements and the requirement for a timely request overall the text provides a detailed overview of the legal process and principles involved in the case
